entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Snow and local blowing snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
